headline: 3 Reasons FTV is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Fortive has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 5.4% to $54.97 per share while the index has gained 10.4%.
